mapper.sql: mr_id, id, medical_time, medical_adress, doctor, diagnosis_results, medical_advice, rgtime, creat_time
mapper.insert: insert into medical_registration (id, medical_time, medical_adress, doctor, diagnosis_results, medical_advice, rgtime, creat_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{medicalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{medicalAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rgtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into medical_registration
id,
medical_time,
medical_adress,
doctor,
diagnosis_results,
medical_advice,
rgtime,
creat_time,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{medicalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{medicalAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update medical_registration
id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
medical_time = #{medicalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
medical_adress = #{medicalAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
diagnosis_results = #{diagnosisResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
medical_advice = #{medicalAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgtime = #{rgtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where mr_id = #{mrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update medical_registration set id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, medical_time = #{medicalTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, medical_adress = #{medicalAdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, doctor = #{doctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, diagnosis_results = #{diagnosisResults,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, medical_advice = #{medicalAdvice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rgtime = #{rgtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where mr_id = #{mrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select B.mr_id,B.id,B.medical_time,B.medical_adress,B.doctor,B.diagnosis_results,B.medical_advice,B.rgtime,B.creat_time, P.oldpeople_name from medical_registration B inner join jd_oldpeople P on B.id = P.oldpeople_id
